## API Reference

## Packages

<table><thead><tr><th>

</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[mintlify-tsdocs](./mintlify-tsdocs.mdx)


</td><td>

API Documenter generates an API reference website from the .api.json files created by API Extractor. The `@microsoft/mintlify-tsdocs` package provides the command-line tool. It also exposes a developer API that you can use to create plugins that customize how API Documenter generates documentation.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
